title: Invitation Homes Announces Dates for First Quarter 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call
author: Invitation Homes Inc.

thread.title: Invitation Homes Announces Dates for First Quarter 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call
thread.title_full: Invitation Homes Announces Dates for First Quarter 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call

text: Invitation Homes Announces Dates for First Quarter 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call   18, 2017, 16:15   DALLAS , April 18,   Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH ) ("Invitation Homes" or the "Company") today announced that it will release its first quarter 2017 financial and operating results on Thursday, May 11, 2017 , after the market closes. The Company will host a conference call on Friday, May 12, 2017 at 11:00 a.m. Eastern time to review first quarter results, discuss recent events, and conduct a question-and-answer session. The conference call will be available via webcast on the Invitation Homes Investor Relations website at ir.invitationhomes.com . To participate in the live telephone conference call: Domestic Dial-in Number: 1-888-317-6016
